item.title: Automated Multi-Node Infrastructure
item.description: Moving from manual configurations to automated orchestration with Ansible on AWS.

Multi-AZ Nginx Orchestration with Ansible A high-availability web architecture deployed on AWS using Ansible for automated configuration management.
